title.rendered: Features You Need To Contact Salesforce For

content.rendered:
Hey all!  Short post, I promise.  Just wanted to share the community managed document of features you need to contact Salesforce to enable or disable.  This document covers many of the features and functionality that require contacting Salesforce, but not all.  As new releases come about, there will also be new items that need to be added to the list.  

You can share additional items by filling out this Google Form, and then the doc will be updated.  Please make sure to vote for an OFFICIAL list on the IdeaExchange here.

The Doc: “Features that Require Contacting Salesforce”

The Form: “Submit Features that Require Contacting Salesforce”

The Idea: “Vote for Official List of Features Requiring Contacting Salesforce”

Big thanks to Mr. Doug Ayers!

excerpt.rendered: Ever wonder what features you need to contact Salesforce to activate or deactivate? Check out the community doc and submit other features you have learned require Salesforce Support.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Native CMS
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Out of the box you you have 3 types of CMS, native CMS is one of those 3. Learn all about it from how to create articles, use cases, and why use Native CMS.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2020
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Salesforce Events 2020 is live!! That's right Ohana, it wouldn't be my blog if I wasn't talking about events and how we connect and get together as humans.  For real, we get out from behind the keyboard, and even leave the HOUSE!!! I know, it's crazy, but for Ohana,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Lightning Recycling Bin
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Currently, if you are using the brand new "Lightning Experience" look of Salesforce, not all the functionality of Salesforce Classic is available. This isn't a bad thing, Lighting is new and alive, changing and growing based on the world today and the ideas and needs of the Salesforce Community. It…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2018
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Find out about the 2018 Salesforce Event, when they are and where. Link to the 2018 Salesforce events calendar and form for to submit updates and new events

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce CRM CMS
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We've talked CMS Connect, Native CMS, now hear all about Salesforce CRM CMS and the wins you get using it in your community!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Add Export Reports in Salesforce Lightning
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Lightning and Classic users unite! Vote to add the ability to export reports in the new Lightning Experience.
